participant_1.name: Ravi
participant_1.personality: Free-spirited and adventurous, enjoys pushing boundaries.
participant_1.background: i am a swim coach at my local pool. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my family and i are from india. my favorite music genre is death metal. i am studying to be a computer programmer.

participant_2.name: Anjali
participant_2.personality: Introverted and thoughtful, finds joy in simple pleasures like reading and watching movies.
participant_2.background: horror movies are my favorites. my father used to work for home depot. i've a son who is in junior high school. i spent a decade working in the human services field.
